title: Civic Code AI Answers Questions
text: TAt Civic Code AI, we specialize in developing customized kiosks that cater to the unique needs of county governments.

section.title: Is there a parade this weekend, and what is its route?
section.content: Providing up-to-date information of county calendars, including both upcoming and past events.

section.title: What are the local parks, museums, and recreations?
section.content: Offering details on nearby parks, museums, recreational facilities, and upcoming community events.
